name: frameworkthreejs

scripts.setup: npm install three && mkdir src\css src\js src\models && echo 'this is my message' > src\css\style.css && echo '!' > index.html && echo > src\css\style.css && echo > src\js\main.js && npm run setupIndex && npm run write && npm run move
scripts.write: echo 'add your code' > src\js\main.js && (echo body { & type tab.txt & echo background-color: white; & echo type tab.txt & echo margin : 0; & echo })> src\css\style.css
scripts.setupIndex: (echo ^<!DOCTYPE html^> & echo ^<html lang='en'^> & echo ^<head^> & type tab.txt & echo ^<meta charset='UTF-8'^> & type tab.txt & echo ^<meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'^> & type tab.txt & echo ^<link rel='stylesheet' href='/src/css/style.css'^> & type tab.txt & echo ^<script src='/src/js/main.js' type='module'^>^</script^> & type tab.txt & echo ^<script src='/src/js/framework.js' type='module'^>^</script^> & type tab.txt & echo ^<title^>Document^</title^> & echo ^</head^> & echo ^<body^> & echo ^</body^> & echo ^</html^>) > index.html

author: Kishan Turpin <kishan.turpin@gmail.com>, Dylan Malaussena
description: This is a Three.js framework for creating 3D web application for TerraNumerica.
